resources.text: Elicitation of 100 basic lexical items presented in alphabetical order. Referred to as "Hoijer's wordlist.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.001

resources.text: Elicitation of various basic vocabulary items. Referred to as a "diagnostic list.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.002

resources.text: Elicitation of nature words and phrases. Includes river, foam, thunder, and "It is cold today.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.003

resources.text: Elicitation of words pertinent to animals. Includes quadriped, bear, deer, etc.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.004

resources.text: Miscellaneous lexical items such as automobile, table, and spoon. Includes many loanwords.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.005

resources.text: Wordlist of domesticated animals like sheep, goat, and various fowl. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.006

resources.text: Elicitation of miscellaneous lexical items, but especially days of the week. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.007

resources.text: Elicitation of words and phrases with the intent to capture vowel system. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.008

resources.text: Numbering system for round items. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.009

resources.text: Numbering system for long items like pencils, snakes, etc.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.010

resources.text: Numbering system for the number of times an action was executed. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.011

resources.text: Numbering system for each type of fruit. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.012

resources.text: Numbering system for counting people. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.013

resources.text: Numbering system for flat things like pages, leaves, etc.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.014

resources.text: Numbering system for machetes, bread, and money. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.015

resources.text: Numbering system for cloth. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.016

resources.text: Numbering system for items in row. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.017

resources.text: Numbering system for days. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.018

resources.text: Numbering system for branches of trees. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.019

resources.text: Numbering system for fathoms. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.020

resources.text: Elicitation of phrases with direct object pronouns. Includes such phrases as "I hit you.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.021

resources.text: Elicitation of phrases with indirect object pronouns. Includes such phrases as "I gave it to you.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.022

resources.text: Elicitation of words and phrases regarding spatial relationships. Includes prepositions like in, on, and over, and phrases like "The pencil is on the table.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.023

resources.text: Elicitation of phrases using conjunctions. Includes phrases like "Elario and I are going fishing.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.024

resources.text: Elicitation of phrases like "That woman is very old." Referred to as "equational sentences.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.025

resources.text: Elicitation of questions such as "How does he do it?" and "How deep is the water?". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive.
resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.026

resources.name: oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.027
